bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition identical with gui zhu 鬼疰 , demon attachment-illness. Shen nong ben cao jing 神農本草經 Substance Entry shi yan 食 鹽：主殺鬼蠱 , 邪疰毒氣 , “It controls killing of demon gu , evil attachment-illness , and poison qi”. Xie zhu 泄注 , outpour [2]

Pathological Condition identical with shui xie 水泄 , watery outflow. Ming yi bie lu 名醫別錄 Substance Entry wu zhu yu 吳茱 萸：根白皮殺蟯蟲，治喉痹，咳逆，止泄注 , “The white bark of its root kills pinworms, cures throat blockage and cough with qi counterflow, and stops outpour ”.
